棋.definition: chess; chess-like game; a game of chess; CL:盤|盘[pan2]; chess piece; CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

棋具.definition: checkers (board and pieces for go 圍棋|围棋 or Chinese chess 象棋 etc)

棋子.definition: chess piece; CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]; (fig.) a pawn (used by others for their own purposes)

棋局.definition: state of play in a game of chess; (old) chessboard

棋譜.definition: kifu (record of a game of go or shogi)

棋逢對手.definition: to be evenly matched; to meet one's match

棋逢敵手.definition: see 棋逢對手|棋逢对手[qi2 feng2 dui4 shou3]

棋高一著.definition: to be a step ahead of the opponent (idiom); to outsmart one's opponent
